name: Solia Invest - 30 Day Development Plan
desc: Complete 30-day roadmap for building multi-tenant SCI platform with KYC functionality

cards.name: Day 1: Initialize monorepo structure
cards.desc:
Set up packages/api and packages/client structure with proper tooling
- Initialize monorepo with Lerna or Nx
- Configure TypeScript for both backend and frontend
- Set up ESLint and Prettier configurations
- Create package.json scripts for development

cards.name: Day 2: Configure MongoDB/Postgres Docker
cards.desc:
Set up database containers and connection management
- Create docker-compose.yml for MongoDB
- Configure environment variables for database connections
- Set up connection pooling and retry logic
- Test database connectivity

cards.name: Day 3: Install Prisma/Mongoose schemas
cards.desc:
Generate User, Tenant, and related schema models
- Define User model with authentication fields
- Create Tenant model with multi-tenant support
- Set up relationships between models
- Configure database migrations

cards.name: Day 4: Implement JWT Auth (login/register)
cards.desc:
Create authentication endpoints with JWT tokens
- Implement /auth/register endpoint
- Create /auth/login endpoint with JWT
- Add password hashing with bcrypt
- Set up refresh token mechanism

cards.name: Day 5: Create SCI schema models
cards.desc:
Define Tenant/Part relationships and SCI resource models
- Create SCIResource model
- Define SCIShare model for ownership
- Set up relationships between SCI and Tenant
- Add validation rules for SCI data

cards.name: Day 6: Create KYC schema models
cards.desc:
Define KYCProfile and KycDocument schemas
- Create KYCProfile model with status tracking
- Define KycDocument model for file uploads
- Set up document validation rules
- Configure file storage for documents

cards.name: Day 7: CRUD routes for Users/Tenants
cards.desc:
Complete REST API endpoints with proper validation
- Implement GET /api/users endpoints
- Create POST /api/tenants endpoint
- Add PUT/PATCH endpoints for updates
- Implement DELETE endpoints with soft delete

cards.name: Day 8: SCI CRUD routes
cards.desc:
Complete SCI creation, update, delete endpoints
- POST /api/sci-resources for creation
- GET /api/sci-resources for listing
- PUT /api/sci-resources/:id for updates
- DELETE /api/sci-resources/:id for removal

cards.name: Day 9: KYC routes (submit/status/update)
cards.desc:
Implement KYC submission and status management
- POST /api/kyc/submit for KYC submission
- GET /api/kyc/status/:userId for status checking
- PUT /api/kyc/update/:id for updates
- Add file upload handling for documents

cards.name: Day 10: Multi-tenant relationships
cards.desc:
Implement tenant isolation and data relationships
- Add tenant middleware for request isolation
- Implement tenant-scoped queries
- Create tenant-specific data filtering
- Test multi-tenant data separation

cards.name: Day 11: Admin middleware & permissions
cards.desc:
Implement role-based access control for admin features
- Create admin middleware for route protection
- Define user roles (admin, user, collector)
- Implement permission checking
- Add role-based route restrictions

cards.name: Day 12: Donation/interaction management
cards.desc:
Create donation tracking and interaction workflows
- Implement Donation model
- Create interaction tracking system
- Add donation receipt generation
- Set up interaction notifications

cards.name: Day 13: UI components & forms
cards.desc:
Build reusable React components for SCI and KYC forms
- Create SCI creation form component
- Build KYC submission form
- Implement form validation with React Hook Form
- Add file upload components

cards.name: Day 14: Data seeding & validation
cards.desc:
Create development data and test validation rules
- Generate seed data for testing
- Create validation schemas with Zod/Yup
- Add data validation middleware
- Test all validation rules

cards.name: Day 15: Admin dashboard routes
cards.desc:
Create admin endpoints for KYC approval and SCI management
- GET /api/admin/kyc/pending for pending reviews
- POST /api/admin/kyc/approve/:id for approvals
- GET /api/admin/sci-resources for management
- Add admin analytics endpoints

cards.name: Day 16: Backend notifications
cards.desc:
Implement notification system for KYC approvals and updates
- Create notification service
- Implement email notifications
- Add in-app notification system
- Set up notification preferences

cards.name: Day 17: Collector/Donor routes
cards.desc:
Create endpoints for collector and donor workflows
- POST /api/collectors/register for collector registration
- GET /api/donations/history for donation tracking
- Implement donation processing endpoints
- Add donor management features

cards.name: Day 18: Complex multi-tenant relations
cards.desc:
Implement advanced tenant data relationships and queries
- Create complex tenant queries
- Implement cross-tenant reporting
- Add tenant-specific analytics
- Optimize tenant data access

cards.name: Day 19: Database optimization
cards.desc:
Add indexes and optimize queries for performance
- Create database indexes for common queries
- Optimize slow queries
- Add query performance monitoring
- Implement caching strategies

cards.name: Day 20: Logging & audit backend
cards.desc:
Implement comprehensive logging and audit trail
- Set up structured logging with Winston
- Create audit log models
- Implement audit trail for all actions
- Add log analysis capabilities

cards.name: Day 21: Frontend integration completion
cards.desc:
Complete frontend-backend integration and validation
- Integrate all API endpoints with frontend
- Add error handling for API calls
- Implement loading states and error messages
- Test complete user workflows

cards.name: Day 22: Error handling
cards.desc:
Implement comprehensive error handling for 500/404 responses
- Create global error handler middleware
- Add custom error classes
- Implement error logging and monitoring
- Create user-friendly error messages

cards.name: Day 23: Security optimization
cards.desc:
Enhance JWT security, CORS configuration, and access controls
- Implement rate limiting
- Add security headers
- Configure CORS properly
- Add input sanitization

cards.name: Day 24: Code cleanup & refactoring
cards.desc:
Refactor code for maintainability and reusability
- Clean up duplicate code
- Extract common utilities
- Improve code organization
- Add code comments and documentation

cards.name: Day 25: Docker production setup
cards.desc:
Configure Docker containers for production deployment
- Create production Dockerfile
- Set up docker-compose for production
- Configure environment variables
- Add health checks

cards.name: Day 26: CI/CD pipeline
cards.desc:
Set up GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment
- Create GitHub Actions workflows
- Set up automated testing
- Configure deployment pipeline
- Add staging environment

cards.name: Day 27: Final backend testing
cards.desc:
Complete unit and integration testing for all backend endpoints
- Write comprehensive unit tests
- Add integration tests for all endpoints
- Test edge cases and error scenarios
- Achieve 80%+ test coverage

cards.name: Day 28: Bug fixes & feedback
cards.desc:
Address bugs from testing and implement feedback
- Fix identified bugs
- Implement user feedback
- Update documentation
- Prepare for production

cards.name: Day 29: Documentation
cards.desc:
Create developer and user documentation
- Write API documentation with Swagger
- Create user guides
- Add inline code documentation
- Create deployment guides

cards.name: Day 30: Production deployment
cards.desc:
Deploy to production with monitoring and health checks
- Deploy to production environment
- Set up monitoring with health checks
- Configure error tracking
- Set up backup procedures
